content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Good afternoon Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. As you know, this is a great location and we are looking for a responsible tenant who will take care of the property.

Regarding the rental price, I am flexible and open to negotiation. However, I am also a landlord and I need to maximize my gains. So, I would like to know what you are willing to pay for the apartment.

Do you have any specific requirements or preferences that you would like to discuss? And, of course, if you have any questions, please feel free to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position as a landlord, but I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am a student and I am very responsible, but I don't have a lot of extra money to spend. So, I would like to know what you are willing to accept for the apartment.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Understood Juan, as a landlord, my goal is to maximize my profits. However, I am also looking for a responsible tenant who will take care of the property.

Considering your situation as a student and your budget, I am willing to negotiate with you on the rental price. However, I cannot accept a rental price that is lower than what the market rate is for a similar apartment in this location.

Would you be willing to discuss a rental price that is within the market rate for this apartment? I would be happy to provide you with more information on the market rate and the specific features of the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your position and I respect it. However, I am still looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am a student and I am very responsible, but I don't have a lot of extra money to spend. So, I would like to know what you are willing to accept for the apartment.

I am willing to negotiate, but my goal is to keep the rental price as low as possible. I am also willing to sign a long-term lease if that will help lower the rental price.

Please provide me with more information on the market rate for similar apartments in this location. I would like to know what the average rental price is for a 25 square meter apartment in this location.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I understand your situation Juan and I respect your decision to look for the lowest possible rental price. However, as a landlord, I need to maximize my profits.

That being said, I am willing to negotiate with you on the rental price. I am open to discussing a long-term lease, as it can help me to secure a stable income stream.

Regarding the market rate for similar apartments in this location, the average rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is around 800-900 euros per month. However, this price can vary depending on the specific features and location of the apartment.

I hope this information is helpful to you. Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there is anything else I can do to assist you in finding a suitable rental arrangement.
name: Heinrich Heine
